## Problem #1

##### *Read and clean the Mr. Trash Wheel sheet:*

```{r}
mr_tw_df =
    read_excel("./data/HealthyHarborWaterWheelTotals2018-7-28.xlsx", sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel") %>% 
    janitor::clean_names() %>% 
    select(-x15)

view(mr_tw_df)
    drop_na(mr_tw, dumpster)
```

note: start at row 2, names = TRUE, skip column 15
